forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain by the afternoon hours. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow this morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 36F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 35F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High -2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 29F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low -8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 18F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low -8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 17F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning followed by periods of snow showers later in the day. High -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early, then some snow showers later in the day. High 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 23F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intermittent snow showers, especially early. High -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers will become more widely scattered in the afternoon. High 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 18F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Flurries and a few snow showers throughout the day. High -4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Flurries and a few snow showers throughout the day. High around 25F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low -8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low 17F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low -9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 16F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early, then some snow showers later in the day. High -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early, then some snow showers later in the day. High 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low near -5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snowfall around one inch.
